H0.text: Smoke is not a mixture, because it consists of solid particles dispersed in a gas.

H2.text: Milk is the item identified as not a mixture in the question "Which of the following is NOT a mixture?".

A4.text: Sucrose has the chemical formula C12H22O11.

A5.text: Since sucrose contains no anomeric hydroxyl groups, it is classified as a non-reducing sugar.
